tooltip.tokenError: A valid token must be set to use Inline Assist

input.title: OpenAnalyst: Quick Task
input.placeholder: e.g., 'refactor this function to be more efficient'

chatParticipant.name: Agent
chatParticipant.description: I can help you with quick tasks and suggested edits.

incompatibilityExtensionPopup.message: The OpenAnalyst Inline Assist is being blocked by a conflict with GitHub Copilot. To fix this, you must disable Copilot's inline suggestions.

terminalCommandGenerator.tipMessage: oa: Press {{shortcut}} to generate terminal commands
terminalCommandGenerator.inputPrompt: oa: Describe the command you want to generate
terminalCommandGenerator.inputPlaceholder: e.g., kill the process running on port 3001, find large files, etc
terminalCommandGenerator.noActiveTerminal: oa: No active terminal found. Please open a terminal first.

warningDialog.title: Terminal Safety Warning
warningDialog.message: Double-check all generated commands before running them. Terminal actions cannot always be undone— running unverified commands can result in irreversible data loss or system damage. Review and understand the command completely before proceeding!
